parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to set the location for this hole table using the document's precision, false to not

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Precision to use for location values if UseDoc set to false

title: IHoleTable.SetHoleLocationPrecision
description: Sets the precision to use for location values for this hole table.
signature:
System.Boolean SetHoleLocationPrecision( 
   System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   System.Int32
Precision
)

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to set the location for this hole table using the document's precision, false to not

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Precision to use for location values if UseDoc set to false

returns: True if precision is set, false if not
